swapHop(address[],(address,address,bytes.details: Uses _swapIn for positive amountSpecified_ (user provides input), _swapOut for negative (user receives output).

params.amountLimits_: The minimum/maximum amount for the unspecified side for all swaps.
params.amountSpecified_: The amount to swap (positive for exact input, negative for exact output).
params.dexKeys_: The dex pools to swap through.

returns.amountUnspecified_: The amount of the unspecified token.

swapSingle((address,address,bytes32),boo.details: Uses _swapIn for positive amountSpecified_ (user provides input), _swapOut for negative (user receives output).

params.amountLimit_: The minimum/maximum amount for the unspecified side.
params.amountSpecified_: The amount to swap (positive for exact input, negative for exact output).
params.dexKey_: The dex pool to swap through.
params.swap0To1_: Whether to swap from token0 to token1 or vice versa.

swapHop(address[],(address,address,bytes.notice: Swap through a path of dex pools

swapSingle((address,address,bytes32),boo.notice: Swap through a single dex pool
